source.7a281286:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

cols = ['Id', 'river', 'location', 'erected', 'purpose', 'length',
        'lanes', 'clear-g', 't-or-d', 'material', 'span', 'rel-l', 'type']

df1 = pd.read_csv('../input/pittsburgh-bridges-data-set/bridges.data.version1', header=None, names = cols)
df2 = pd.read_csv('../input/pittsburgh-bridges-data-set/bridges.data.version2', header=None, names = cols)

df1 = df1.replace({'?':np.nan})
df2 = df2.replace({'?':np.nan})
source.c329db4f:
series = df2.rename({'length':'length_', 'erected':'erected_'}, axis=1)[['length_', 'erected_']]

df1 = pd.concat([df1, series], axis=1)
source.a338b9a2:
lst1 = list(df1['erected_'].unique()) 
lst2 = list(df1['length_'].unique())


for lst in lst1:
    mask = df1['erected_'] == lst
    dfa = df1.loc[mask, 'erected']
    print(lst)
    print(dfa.min())
    print(dfa.max())
